name: Mana Manager
description:
Embody a wizard trying to get rid of monsters. 

Use your spells wisely as your mana regenerates very slowly!

Find the correct spell combinations and timing to destroy your ennemies.

If you manage to clear the 5 stages, the "hard mode" will be unlocked, let's see if you can survive to that!

Mana Manager is a game made in 48H during the game jam Ludum Dare #39

please comment and rate here : https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/mana-manager
